excerpt: This delicious vegan pasta dish is packed with nutrients and flavour!

instructions.name: Boiling Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Add salt and pasta to the pot.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Drain the pasta and set aside.

instructions.name: Spinach and Mushroom Sauce
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender.
Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted.
Add plant-based milk, cornstarch mixture, and nutritional yeast to the pan.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Cook until the sauce thickens and simmers for a few minutes.
Serve the pasta with the sauce on top.
